1111298582970331136.text: It is primarily the result of ignorant people being convinced that science is not real and that conspiracy theorists are gains lots of traction.https://twitter.com/neiltyson/status/1111295662920888320 …

1111300976676265984.text:
It’s bigger than that, imo. The medical world insists it is science as if that is unchanging & unchallengeable, all the while changing & subject to challenges. 

Education failures run deep. First order would seem to be skepticism & critical thinking. 

As trite as that sounds.

1111301353324732416.text: Debates about vaccines bring this to light daily in my community. A lot of trafficking in distrust & disbelief.
